name: Solar System (itch) (Jose Alvarez)
description:
This Solar System project was made for the Game Design and Development with Unity 2020 course in coursera.

The additional features in the game are:

  • Inclusion of the rest of the planets of the Solar System
  • Creation of the Asteroid Belt Between Mars and Jupiter
  • Background change (Photo by Max McKinnon on Unsplash)

Credits:

Created by Juan Jose Alvarez Salinas

Assets and guidance provided by the University of Michigan
